 float CompareGeneAndTextContextModels.getCosineSimilarity(ContextVector cv1, ContextVector cv2)
          Calculates the cosine of the angle between both vectors as a measure of similarity.
cos0 = x * y / (||x|| * ||y||)
A return value of zero means that both vectors are orthogonal.
static float CompareContextVectors.getCosineSimilarity(ContextVector cv1, ContextVector cv2)
          Calculates the cosine of the angle between both vectors as a measure of similarity.
cos0 = x * y / (||x|| * ||y||)
A return value of zero means that both vectors are orthogonal.
